empty.title: No Interview Processes
empty.description: You haven't created any interview processes yet. Click on "New Interview Process" to get started.

warning.notEnoughSlots: {{invited}} applicants invited, but only {{slots}} slots available. Please create more slots.
warning.notEnoughSlotsSingular: {{invited}} applicant invited, but only {{slots}} slots available. Please create more slots.
warning.zeroSlots: {{invited}} applicants invited, but no slots are available. Please create new slots.
warning.zeroSlotsSingular: {{invited}} applicant invited, but no slots are available. Please create new slots.

error.title: Failed to load slots
error.description: There was an error loading the interview slots. Please try again.

loadFailed.detail: Failed to load interview process details

empty.title: No slots yet
empty.description: Create your first interview slots to get started.

loadFailed.detail: The interview slots could not be loaded. Please refresh the page or contact an admin.

create.title: Create Interview Slots

success.detail: Interview slots have been created successfully.

generic.detail: Failed to create slots. Please try again.

conflict.detail: Some slots conflict with existing ones. Please adjust the times.

validation.detail: Please check the form for errors.

noSlots.detail: Please create at least one slot before saving.

validation.endBeforeStart: End time must be after start time
validation.conflictSameProcess: Conflict with an existing slot ({{time}}) in this interview process
validation.conflictBookedOther: Conflict with a booked slot ({{time}}) in another interview process
validation.hasConflicts: Please resolve all time conflicts before saving
validation.streamLinkRequired: Meeting link is required for virtual slots
validation.durationPositive: Duration must be at least 1 minute

locationRequired.detail: Location is required for all slots

validation.rangeTooShort: Time range is too short for a {{duration}} min interview

create.breakTooltip: Break time between consecutive interview slots
create.addRangeTooltip: Automatically create multiple interview slots within a time window using the configured break time
create.addSlotsTooltip: Add single slots manually one by one

copySuccess.detail: Slot configurations were successfully applied to all days.

create.noDateSelectedDesc: Please select one or multiple dates in the calendar
create.noSlotsYetDesc: Add a time range or a single slot to get started
create.singleSlotHelp: Enter a start time. The interview duration determines the end time.
create.rangeSlotHelp: Enter start and end time. Slots are automatically calculated based on duration and break time.
create.useForAll: Use same location for all slots

confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this slot?

error.detail: The slot could not be deleted. Please try again or contact an admin.

errorForbidden.detail: You don't have permission to delete this slot

resendConfirmation.message: This applicant has already been invited. Do you want to send the invitation email again?

invalidApplications.detail: Some applications belong to a different job

forbidden.detail: You don't have permission for this action

partial.detail: Failed: {{emails}}. Please try sending the invitations again.

error.detail: Failed to send invitation. Please try again or contact an admin.

assign.title: Assign Applicant to Slot
assign.allAssigned: All applicants in the interview process already have a Slot

success.detail: Applicant has been assigned to the slot.

notInProcess.detail: Applicant is not in this interview process

failed.detail: An error occurred while assigning the applicant. Please try again.

rating.label: Score
rating.info: Rate the interview. This is not visible to applicants.

saveFailed.detail: Could not save the assessment. Please try again.

loadFailed.detail: Could not load applicant. Please reload the page.

notFound.detail: This applicant does not exist or has been removed.
